column4: Can someone provide me with a list of termilan codes that may lead me to my playing problem?
are  yu able to mount / browse the DVD?
that is a media player issue, try a better one :)
well, I HOPE it is a media player issue.
if not, we get to debug alsa (shudder)
you have VLC, good. What does it complain about when running it from cli with -vvv ?

this is what I get for video in VLC --> http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d120/iminhell/Screenshot-1-1.png  --- No errors that pop up, not sure if they are in a separate window or where they may be located ... ?
run vlc from the CLI with -vvv
I gotcha now, is vlc though and not vvv.   It has stalled here --->  http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d120/iminhell/Screenshot-2-1.png   tried a few times and it just sits there ... ?
vlc comes up with errors cracking css, trying a burned/stripped dvd now
at least yoou know what the problem is and what to look for, correct?
(i'm pretty clueless from this point on)
